title: Library Request: cesium
body:
[cesium](https://github.com/cesium-ml/cesium) is an open source library that allows users to:
- extract features from raw time series data ([see list](http://cesium-ml.org/docs/feature_table.html)),
- build machine learning models from these features, and
- generate predictions for new data.

#### Checklist
- [x] I have completely filled out this template
- [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch
- [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)
- [x] I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue
